item.title: In Epstein furor, Trump struggles to shake off a controversy his allies once stoked
item.description: President Donald Trump faces ongoing questions about the Jeffrey Epstein case, overshadowing his administration’s achievements.

item.title: A man is stopped climbing the US-Mexico border wall. Under new Trump rules, US troops sound the alarm
Deportation flights from Florida’s ‘Alligator Alcatraz’ detention center have begun, DeSantis says
